description: {"blocks":[{"key":"77kv6","text":"The purpose of this protocol is to amplify IgG antibody variable regions derived from rat hybridoma RNA, using RT-PCR and Sanger sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjrcp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cit5l","text":"Materials needed:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7rbs","text":"-        RNA extraction: Qiagen RNEasy mini kit (74104)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s9pc","text":"-        Reverse Transcription Kit: SMARTScribe Reverse Transcriptase (639537)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4um59","text":"-        DNA Polymerase: Invitrogen Platinum SuperFi II PCR Master Mix (12368010)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1poc1","text":"-        Invitrogen's PureLink™ PCR Purification Kit #K310001","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"947si","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"h4ms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ubm7","text":"The layout of this protocol was adapted from a protocol composed by Andrew McGuire's laboratory at the Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center, which in turn was adapted from Meyer et al 2019 \"A simplified workflow for monoclonal antibody sequencing.\" See attachment for the respective manuscript.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ld7i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8812f","text":"For this protocol, rat-specific primers were designed, as the immunization campaign was executed in rats. See attachment for the primer design strategy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2jl1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

documents.ofn: Meyer et al 2019 A simplified workflow for monoclonal antibody sequencing.pdf

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"cc6d8","text":"TS pF is ordered as RNA oligo; the remainder as DNA oligo","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fne1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o2pc","text":"universal TS pF	AAGCAGTGGTATCAACGCAGAGTACATrGrGrG

ISPCR pF	        aagcagtggtatcaacgcagag

rat IGHG RT pR	GGACAGGGCTCCAGAGTTCC

rat IGHG PCR pR	GACTGGCTCAGGGAAATAGCC

rat IGKC RT pR	CTGATCAGTAACACTGTCCAGGAC

rat IGKC PCR pR	CACTGATGTCTCTGGGATAGAAGTTG

rat IGLC1 RT pR	GGGAGATAGGTGCACCATTTGC

rat IGLC1 PCR pR	GGCCACTTCCACATCACTCG

rat IGLC2 RT pR	TCCACACCCTGAGTGATAGGG

rat IGLC2 PCR pR	CTTCCAGACCACTGTCATAACACC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sde4","text":"RNA extraction: Extract RNA from the hybridoma sample using RNeasy total RNA kit, according to the manufacturer’s instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhatq","text":"Reverse Transcription: On ice, prepare the 1st reaction mix in PCR tubes for gamma chain and kappa chain (or lambda chain) cDNA synthesis according to the following recipe:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23},{"style":"sup","offset":44,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5np6n","text":"Gamma","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pj8i","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekuf7","text":"ComponentVolume per rxnIGHG RT pR (10 uM)1 uLdNTP (10 mM)1 uLRNA sample (50 ng/uL)2 uLTotal volume4 uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":102}],"data":{}},{"key":"ds0i5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p6b1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[193,81],"data":[["\u003cb\u003eComponent\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eVolume per rxn\u003c/b\u003e"],["IGHG RT pR (10 uM)","1 uL"],["dNTP (10 mM)","1 uL"],["RNA sample (50 ng/uL)","2 uL"],["\u003cb\u003eTotal volume\u003c/b\u003e","4 uL"]],"guid":"79F0D0903F9B11EEA8C52102D579B69E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["\u003cb\u003eComponent\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eVolume per rxn\u003c/b\u003e"],["IGHG RT pR (10 uM)","1 uL"],["dNTP (10 mM)","1 uL"],["RNA sample (50 ng/uL)","2 uL"],["\u003cb\u003eTotal volume\u003c/b\u003e","4 uL"]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m0ep","text":"On ice, prepare a 2nd mastermix in Eppendorf tubes. This recipe if for one reaction regardless of chain type. Scale up for the number of samples as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":19,"length":2},{"style":"italic","offset":110,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj56d","text":"2nd reaction mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16},{"style":"sup","offset":1,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn2uv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"374p4","text":"ComponentVolume per rxn5x SMARTScribe buffer2 uLDTT (20 mM)1 uLUniversal TS pR (100 uM)0.3 uLH2O1.70 uLTotal volume5.00 uL","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":122}],"data":{}},{"key":"642kn","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["267","122"],"data":[["\u003cb\u003eComponent\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eVolume per rxn\u003c/b\u003e"],["5x SMARTScribe buffer","2 uL"],["DTT (20 mM)","1 uL"],["Universal TS pR (100 uM)","0.3 uL"],["H2O","1.70 uL"],["\u003cb\u003eTotal volume\u003c/b\u003e","5.00 uL"]],"guid":"CC6166003F9B11EEA8C52102D579B69E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["\u003cb\u003eComponent\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eVolume per rxn\u003c/b\u003e"],["5x SMARTScribe buffer","2 uL"],["DTT (20 mM)","1 uL"],["Universal TS pR (100 uM)","0.3 uL"],["H2O","1.70 uL"],["\u003cb\u003eTotal volume\u003c/b\u003e","5.00 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mfv","text":"After preparing the 2nd mastermix, incubate each of the 1st reaction mixes in a thermocycler for 3 minutes at 72°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":21,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":57,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":97,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3t3v1","text":"Once the incubation of the 1st reaction mix (from step 3.5) finishes, add 6 uL of the 2nd reaction mix to each tube of the 1st reaction mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":28,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":87,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":124,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6448","text":"With the 2 reaction mixes now combined, incubate each according to the following conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ll6o","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1olfl","text":"TemperatureTimeCycles42°C60 min170°C5 min14°Chold-","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":50}],"data":{}},{"key":"7vv9p","text":" Proceed to PCR amplification step immediately after incubation has finished (once samples reach 4°C hold step).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":""},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":["172","105","93"],"data":[["\u003cb\u003eTemperature\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eTime\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eCycles\u003c/b\u003e"],["42°C","60 min","1"],["70°C","5 min","1"],["4°C","hold","-"]],"guid":"1F5905C03F9C11EEA8C52102D579B69E","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["\u003cb\u003eTemperature\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eTime\u003c/b\u003e","\u003cb\u003eCycles\u003c/b\u003e"],["42°C","60 min","1"],["70°C","5 min","1"],["4°C","hold","-"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"80f60","text":"PCR amplification: Prepare mastermix for PCR reaction according to following 2-step recipe:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62c1l","text":"Verify the gel bands","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ibmp","text":"After PCR reaction completes, set up 1% agarose gel according to the following conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dudse","text":"In a flask, add the following components:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qda6","text":"0.5 g – Agarose powder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cp7il","text":"50 mL – 1X TAE buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q5p1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab9ut","text":"Put flask, with added reagents, in microwave and heat up until all the powder is fully dissolved (about 1 minute).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr01i","text":"After microwaving is finished, remove flask with hot pad; add 5 uL of Sybrsafe to flask, swirl to mix. Pour into a tray with appropriate plastic comb, preferably one with wells that accommodate 20uL volumes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm2l6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63dl1","text":"Prepare a fraction of each PCR products to verify the band size on the gel. Aliquot 5 uL from each PCR tube into a new PCR strip, and add 1 uL of DNA Loading Dye to each sample. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cv88p","text":"Load the gel and run it for 25-30 minutes at 110 V. Modify these settings if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":52,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82l0g","text":"Remove gel, image, and save an image copy for the records.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnpoq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av822","text":"Note: There should be a gamma chain, and either a kappa or lambda chain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chhl2","text":"Amplified rat antibody products: 550-600 bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jfam","text":"A significant majority of mouse antibody light chains will be kappa; if kappa not present, repeat with IGLC1 and IGLC2 samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4d0vq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhipn","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"294h4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":235,"id":398373,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nfbhb8ddx.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nfbfb8ddx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nfbgb8ddx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nfbeb8ddx.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15t0m","text":"PCR cleanup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db1bi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rngq","text":"PCR samples that produce a band of the expected size can then be finalized using a PCR purification kit (e.g. Invitrogen's PureLink™ PCR Purification Kit #K310001), and eluted in 25 uL volume. Verify cDNA concentration by nanodrop.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1qmh","text":"Sanger sequencing should be performed (e.g. GeneWiz or Genomic Core).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69jv6","text":"Analyze the antibody nucleotide sequence  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l868","text":"Open the website: https://www.imgt.org/IMGT_vquest/vquest","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":18,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":39}],"data":{}},{"key":"f9gr0","text":"Copy and paste sequence into the IMGT webpage, in the section “sequence submission”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c4o9","text":"Select “Rattus norvergicus” for species, and “IGH” as receptor type or locus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u3ab","text":"Click on \"Start\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4in9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b95gl","text":" title: IgG sequencing of rat hybridoma
